title: Periodic Table
summary: Periodic Table - One of the simple and best Periodic Table app on Play Store.

descriptionHTML:
Periodic Table with Voice Recognition makes it easy and fast to search your favourite Elements.

Periodic Table App has all the information you will ever need.

1.Element Name
2.Atomic Mass
3.NFPA 704
4.Alchemical Symbol
5.Electron Shell

Features :

1.Voice Recognition
2.Easy Navigation with Navigation Drawer
3.Quick Web Search
